data.eml:eml: The Sarcophagidae (Insecta: Diptera) described by Chien-ming Chao and Xue-zhong Zhang

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Dong, Zhang, Ming, Li, Zijuan, Pape, Thomas (2015): The Sarcophagidae (Insecta: Diptera) described by Chien-ming Chao and Xue-zhong Zhang. Zootaxa 3946 (4): 451-509, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3946.4.1
